cardigan: This item is a knitted cardigan with a green, black, and off-white argyle pattern. It features a V-neck design, ribbed trim, and a button-down front with beige buttons. The brand label 'kaited' is visible on the inner neckline. The cardigan appears to be of a thick, warm material suitable for cold weather.

This item is an Anker 521 Power Bank (PowerCore Fusion, 45W) in a matte gray finish, with a variety of input and output options, and decorated with unique stickers on one side.
